name: StarTech HeatGrease 20 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Ceramic-based compound containing silicone, Thermal conductivity of more than 1.066 W/m-K, Color: White, Bleed: <0.05% at 200°C/24 hours, Evaporation: <0.001% at 200°C/24 hours, Materials: Silicone Compounds 50% Carbon Compounds 20% Metal Oxide Compounds 30%, Thermal Resistance: <0.195°C-m2/W, Thermal Conductivity: >1.066 W/(m·K)]
